nodes.title: fix: show focus ring when table row is focused in read mode
nodes.bodyText:
A table is still focusable in read mode and should still show a focus ring.
Steps to reproduce:

Open https://storybook.nextui.org/iframe.html?args=&id=components-table--static&viewMode=story
Press tab
Press leftleftleftleft

Fixed:

  
    
    

    simplescreenrecorder-2023-08-06_21.00.42.mp4

commit.message: fix: show focus ring when table row is focused in read mode

nodes.body:
@jguddas is attempting to deploy a commit to the **NextUI** Team on [Vercel](https://vercel.com).

A member of the Team first needs to [authorize it](https://vercel.com/git/authorize?team=NextUI&type=github&job=%7B%22headInfo%22%3A%7B%22sha%22%3A%227c3f3e6e2ebfac9d128012a3d37ac168a63cab34%22%7D%2C%22id%22%3A%22QmStKCysugEQnJ2fiJ3Uo2vFyJz2wG8jnqxcwp8Nci8vZb%22%2C%22org%22%3A%22nextui-org%22%2C%22prId%22%3A1303%2C%22repo%22%3A%22nextui%22%7D).

###  🦋  Changeset detected

Latest commit: 5f86ac9020ea7a4371c76ae54db933da176a85b6

**The changes in this PR will be included in the next version bump.**

<details><summary>This PR includes changesets to release 2 packages</summary>

  | Name              | Type  |
| ----------------- | ----- |
| @nextui-org/table | Patch |
| @nextui-org/react | Patch |

</details>

Not sure what this means? [Click here  to learn what changesets are](https://github.com/changesets/changesets/blob/main/docs/adding-a-changeset.md).

[Click here if you're a maintainer who wants to add another changeset to this PR](https://github.com/jguddas/nextui/new/fix/show-focus-ring-when-table-row-is-focused-in-read-mode?filename=.changeset/wise-cougars-cross.md&value=---%0A%22%40nextui-org%2Ftable%22%3A%20patch%0A---%0A%0Afix%3A%20show%20focus%20ring%20when%20table%20row%20is%20focused%20in%20read%20mode%0A)

nodes.title: fix(tooltip): behavior of tooltip trigger with delay
nodes.bodyText:
Closes #1168
📝 Description
The tooltip should not open again after the delay is not reached and the cursor moves out.
⛳️ Current behavior (updates)
Fix the trigger behavior to prevent it from opening again after the delay is not reached and the cursor moves out.
🚀 New behavior
Use triggerProps instead of custom on-pointer events, it already includes the correct pointer behavior.
💣 Is this a breaking change (Yes/No):
No.
📝 Additional Information
Before

  
    
    

    before.webm
    
  

  

  


After

  
    
    

    after.webm

commit.message: fix(tooltip): use trigger-props instead of custom on-pointer events

nodes.title: fix: fixes tab submitting form on click
nodes.bodyText:
Closes #1231
📝 Description
This PR fixes tabs submitting forms when clicked.
⛳️ Current behavior (updates)
Tabs submit forms when clicked.
🚀 New behavior
Tabs don't submit forms when clicked
💣 Is this a breaking change (Yes/No):
No
📝 Additional Information
None

commit.message: fix: fixes tab submitting form on click

files_with_diffs.patch: @@ -213,4 +213,51 @@ import customVariantsSlots from "@/content/customization/custom-variants/slots-c All NextUI components have the `Styles source` link on top of the page. This link will take you to the styles source code of the component. You can use this as a reference when creating your own custom component. - \ No newline at end of file + + + +### Types + +### Main Function + +```jsx +const Component = extendVariants(BaseComponent, options, config) + +/** + * BaseComponent -> NextUI component to extend + * options -> the variants to add/modify + * config -> config to extend the component + */ + +``` + +### Options + +```ts +type ExtendVariantsOptions = { + variants?: Record>, + defaultVariants?: Record, + compoundVariants?: Array & ClassProp> +} + +``` + +### Config + +```ts + /** + * Whether to merge the class names with `tailwind-merge` library. + * It's avoid to have duplicate tailwind classes. (Recommended) + * @see https://github.com/dcastil/tailwind-merge/blob/v1.8.1/README.md + * @default true + */ + twMerge?: boolean; + /** + * The config object for `tailwind-merge` library. + * @see https://github.com/dcastil/tailwind-merge/blob/v1.8.1/docs/configuration.md + */ + twMergeConfig?: TWMergeConfig; + ``` + +> **Note**: See the [Tailwind Merge Config](https://github.com/dcastil/tailwind-merge/blob/v1.8.1/docs/configuration.md) to learn more about it. +

nodes.title: fix: resolved cursor issues in pagination
nodes.bodyText:
The cursor does not animate anymore on initial render and non page change prop changes.
The cursor hover state now looks good with disableAnimation set.
The animated cursor is now transparent to the cursor (pointer-events: none).

commit.message: fix: resolved cursor issues in pagination

nodes.body:
@jguddas is attempting to deploy a commit to the **NextUI** Team on [Vercel](https://vercel.com).

A member of the Team first needs to [authorize it](https://vercel.com/git/authorize?team=NextUI&type=github&job=%7B%22headInfo%22%3A%7B%22sha%22%3A%22ea2f110148ea81596cb7c2b9ba954c408fe9beb1%22%7D%2C%22id%22%3A%22QmYuNPoS4vR1euUeG55MWogSvT6yYniDFLPQxukaZRGG5Y%22%2C%22org%22%3A%22nextui-org%22%2C%22prId%22%3A1222%2C%22repo%22%3A%22nextui%22%7D).
@jguddas could you please upload a video showing the issues?

> @jguddas could you please upload a video showing the issues? ### The cursor hover state now looks good with `disableAnimation` set. #### After This makes more sense as the hover state and is also the way it already looks like for `disableAnimation={false}`. #### Before ### The animated cursor is now transparent to the cursor (`pointer-events: none`). When you hover over the active item you now have the pointer just like you would expect and already have with `disableAnimation={true}`. ### The cursor does not animate any more on initial render and non page change prop changes. #### After https://github.com/nextui-org/nextui/assets/25524993/2edf3747-a853-4d7c-8837-76da9a9d7bc5 #### Before Here you see when we load the table with pagination the purple cursor moves from the left to its initial position. https://github.com/nextui-org/nextui/assets/25524993/3a6a99ab-8c78-4bd7-a7cf-43eaa64c04d6
Hey @jguddas why did you remove the initial animation? does it have issues? If so please send post one

@denishnavadiya123 is attempting to deploy a commit to the **NextUI** Team on [Vercel](https://vercel.com).

A member of the Team first needs to [authorize it](https://vercel.com/git/authorize?team=NextUI&type=github&job=%7B%22headInfo%22%3A%7B%22sha%22%3A%2226a5ca0c23e0d715fce00b5a46607732cb8d76ac%22%7D%2C%22id%22%3A%22QmUgcb9mtjHEnUr5fAWHjzzbRYSs6bQjH116yqiVm4rij3%22%2C%22org%22%3A%22nextui-org%22%2C%22prId%22%3A1219%2C%22repo%22%3A%22nextui%22%7D).

nodes.bodyText: Nice, just a few comments @jguddas

nodes.body:
You can try it out, and you will see that it does not get read out if you change a label dynamically like this.

Even if it would work, `aria-pressed` is the right pattern for toggle buttons like this.

https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/Accessibility/ARIA/Attributes/aria-pressed
Native buttons do not have a toggle state, this would only not be needed if it would for example be a checkbox.

nodes.bodyText: Good fixes!, thank you! @Khanhtran47

nodes.title: fix: fixed pagination problems
nodes.bodyText:
This PR:

removes the padding from the top and bottom (elements should not be padded IMO).
makes it so the focus ring is not cut off anymore.
makes it so the focus does not get lost when elements move.

nodes.body:
@jguddas is attempting to deploy a commit to the **NextUI** Team on [Vercel](https://vercel.com).

A member of the Team first needs to [authorize it](https://vercel.com/git/authorize?team=NextUI&type=github&job=%7B%22headInfo%22%3A%7B%22sha%22%3A%226127b7f818b515b2bec999342ef309b894c6ca1b%22%7D%2C%22id%22%3A%22QmP7R63jDEPbeR5B86qu7E5saCWBQBqvhSDkNjcn2nuAcw%22%2C%22org%22%3A%22nextui-org%22%2C%22prId%22%3A1174%2C%22repo%22%3A%22nextui%22%7D).
Hey @jguddas if you remove the padding the scale animation will be break since it needs some space to display it, I had to use it because the overflow need to be the scroll one

files_with_diffs.patch:
@@ -27,8 +27,8 @@ const pagination = tv({
       "flex-nowrap",
       "h-fit",
       "max-w-fit",
-      "py-2.5",
-      "px-1",
+      "p-2.5",
+      "-m-2.5",
       "relative",
       "gap-1",
       "items-center",
@@ -46,6 +46,7 @@ const pagination = tv({
       "justify-center",
       "origin-center",
       "left-0",
+      "z-20",
     ],
     forwardIcon: "hidden group-hover:block data-[before=true]:rotate-180",
     ellipsis: "group-hover:hidden",
@@ -196,7 +197,7 @@ const pagination = tv({
       isCompact: true,
       variant: "bordered",
       class: {
-        item: "[&:not(:first-of-type)]:border-l-0",
+        item: "[&:not(:first-of-type)]:ml-[calc(theme(borderWidth.2)*-1)]",
       },
     },
     /**
@@ -336,6 +337,7 @@ const pagination = tv({
         "justify-center",
         "text-default-foreground",
         // focus ring
+        "data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10",
         "data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-none",
         "data-[focus-visible=true]:ring-2",
         "data-[focus-visible=true]:ring-primary",
